sources.title: Lixus
sources.content:
Lixus may refer to:

Lixus (ancient city), a Phoenician city in Morocco
Lixus (beetle), a genus of true weevils
Lixus (mythology), in Greek mythology, a son of Aegyptus and Caliadne
